intro: Your route, your rules, your delivery!
description:
Parcels don’t deliver themselves, and the city won’t make things easy for you. Take the wheel and face the intense daily grind of a delivery driver, navigating busy streets, tight shortcuts, and surprises at every corner. Collect orders, load the cargo, and plan the best route to arrive on time.

Unlock achievements by completing special objectives, beating the clock without crashing your car, and maintaining delivery streaks with no delays. More challenges mean more reasons to improve with every run!

The goal is simple: deliver as much as possible, earn rewards, buy a variety of insane vehicles, and upgrade your operation to become a true reference in the city. Because here, every second counts and every delivery makes a difference!
